projects.name: S2D2: A Self-Supervised Dataset Distillation Framework for Foundation Models
projects.description: Developed an unsupervised dataset distillation framework combining self-supervised learning (DINOv2/CLIP) with hierarchical clustering and soft-label optimization, enabling model-agnostic compression that distills ImageNet-1K to 1,000-10,000 synthetic images while maintaining generalization performance across foundation models

projects.name: Music OCR System Based on ViT-YOLO Architecture
projects.description: Developed an OCR system that converts sheet music images into playable audio by integrating YOLO's efficient local object detection with Vision Transformer's global context modeling, achieving 98% accuracy on the DeepScores v2 dataset

professional_summary: AI/ML Software Engineer with experience in full-stack development, multi-agent systems, and large-scale distributed systems. Master's student at Brown University specializing in Deep Learning and Computer Vision. Proven track record at Huawei, Epic Systems, and startups building RAG systems, AI infrastructure, and production ML pipelines.
